message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get a great deal on a high-quality item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you in the middle. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $11000?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10500?
I'm still a bit far from $10500, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. How about we meet at $10750?
I'm getting close, but I still need to save a bit more. Would you be willing to meet me at $10500 again?

I've already met you at $10500 once, and I'm not willing to go back on that. I'm willing to make one more concession, so how about we meet at $10750 again, but this time I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal?
I appreciate the extras, but I'm still not comfortable going above $10500. Would you be willing to meet me at $10500 and throw in some extras instead?
